title: If I write from my left hand, will it become my right hand or will it remain to be my left hand? - Quora

response.answer_text: It will still remain your left hand…just you will be able to utilise it more….its adaptability increases….earlier it was mostly being used for supporting heavy jobs…swinging during run or jog…now you have added a better feature to it.
I’ve written with my left hand all my life and it has stayed my left hand, so yes. it will stay that way. Your right hand will also stay on the right if you were to write with it.
